title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: MOOC Design and Implementation for Sustaining Online Science Learning

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three core strategies (shortened course duration, narrative structure design, diversified activity placement) to improve retention rates when designing MOOCs
Ability to analyze learner engagement patterns and derive improvement plans based on learning analytics data
Application of project-based assessment in small-scale online environments to measure learning outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
